title: Bio-Kult Candea - 60 Capsules - Probiotic for Intimate Flora, Probiotic for Women, Probiotic for Men, with Garlic and Grapefruit Extract
features: Bio-Kult Candéa contains seven probiotic strains, specifically designed to target the gut. Includes lactobacillus acidophilus (see ‘probiotic strains’ for full list below)
Bio-Kult’s unique probiotic formulations are proven to survive the high acidity of the stomach
Also contains garlic and grapefruit seed extract - proven to be compatible with the live bacteria in Bio-Kult Candéa
Suitable to be taken alongside antibiotics, when pregnant, when travelling, by vegetarians and as part of a healthy diet
During the summer months products may arrive warm but Amazon stores and ships products in accordance with manufacturers' recommendations, when provided.
